style: body{margin:0;}#dropdown{display:block;margin:40px calc((100vw - 130px)/2)}#dropdown #dropdown-button{font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-weight:bold;font-size:1rem;letter-spacing:1px;text-transform:uppercase;display:flex;align-items:center;gap:10px;color:#d8d8d8;background-color:#1b1b1b;padding:12px 20px;background-clip:padding-box;position:relative;border-radius:5px;border:none;cursor:pointer}#dropdown #dropdown-button::after{position:absolute;top:-4px;bottom:-4px;left:-4px;right:-4px;background-image:conic-gradient(#FF0000, #FFC700, #9EFF00, #00FFFF, #0038FF, #AD00FF, #FF006B, #FF0000, #FF0000);content:'';z-index:-1;border-radius:5px}#dropdown #dropdown-button img{transition:.2s}#dropdown #dropdown-content{display:none;flex-direction:column;margin-top:1.5rem;gap:.8rem;padding:20px 22px 20px 16px;width:130px;border-radius:5px;list-style:none;opacity:0;background-color:#1b1b1b;transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);transition:transform ease-out 200ms;transition-timing-function:cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);transition-duration:400ms;transform:scale(0.95, 0.95) translate3d(0, 0, 0)}#dropdown #dropdown-content li{font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-weight:bold;font-size:0.875rem;letter-spacing:1px;color:#e2e2e2;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between}#dropdown.ativo #dropdown-content{z-index:9999;position:absolute;display:flex;opacity:1;transform:scale(1, 1) translate3d(0, 0, 0)}#dropdown.ativo #dropdown-button img{transform:rotate(180deg)}#dropdown.ativo li{cursor:pointer}h1#title{text-align:center;width:fit-content;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;margin:40px auto 0 auto;padding-top:40px;min-width:100vw;background-color:#090909;font-size:2.5rem;font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-weight:bold;color:#e2e2e2;line-height:2.6875rem}h1#title span{font-size:1rem;font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-weight:600;color:#9f9f9f;letter-spacing:2px}#main-div{padding:60px 0;background-color:#090909}#main-div button{margin:0 auto;color:#2997ff;background-color:#090909;padding:10px 20px;font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-size:1rem;transition:transform ease-out 200ms;transition-duration:200ms;cursor:pointer;display:flex;gap:10px;align-items:center}#main-div button::after{content:'';display:block;margin-top:2px;width:5px;height:11px;background-image:url(../img/seta-apple.svg);background-position:center;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover}#main-div button img{display:block;width:20px;height:10px}#main-div button:hover{text-decoration:underline}#cookies{margin:100px auto 0;padding:30px 45px;width:fit-content;background-color:#090909;border-radius:5px;display:flex;gap:30px;align-items:center}#cookies p{font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-weight:400;color:#e2e2e2;line-height:1.375rem;font-size:1rem}#cookies p span{text-decoration:underline;color:#2997ff}#cookies button{display:flex;gap:10px;align-items:center;color:#2997ff;background-color:#090909;padding:10px 20px;font-family:'Inter',sans-serif;font-size:1rem;transition:transform ease-out 200ms;transition-duration:200ms;cursor:pointer}#cookies button:hover{text-decoration:underline} #cookies button::after{content:'';display:block;margin-top:2px;width:5px;height:11px;background-image:url(../img/seta-apple.svg);background-position:center;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover}#main-div button img{display:block;width:20px;height:10px;}
